results.title: Sporadic rippling muscle disease unmasked by simvastatin.

results.title: Statin-associated myasthenic weakness.
results.text_hl: CASE REPORT: In 2007, a 50-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with generalized, limb predominated, @<m>DISEASE_Myasthenia_Gravis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009157 @@@myasthenia gravis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Myasthenia_Gravis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009157 @@@MG@@@), whose @<m>DISEASE_Myasthenia_Gravis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009157 @@@MG@@@ status has been "minimal manifestation" for several years, developed moderately severe fluctuating @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@bulbar weakness@@@ a few weeks after starting @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg/day.

citations.NLM: Pasutharnchat N, Phanthumchinda K. Statin-associated myasthenic weakness. J Med Assoc Thai. 2011 Feb;94(2):256-8. PMID: 21534375
citations.BibTeX: @article{21534375, title={Statin-associated myasthenic weakness.}, author={Pasutharnchat N and Phanthumchinda K}, journal={J Med Assoc Thai}, volume={94}, number={2}, pages={256-8}}

results.title: Bibliometric analysis of the scientific production as regards statin use for ophthalmological symptoms of myasthenia gravis.
results.text_hl: The majority of publications relating to @<m>DISEASE_Myasthenia_Gravis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009157 @@@MG@@@ are reports of cases linked to a worsening of the @<m>DISEASE_Myasthenia_Gravis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009157 @@@MG@@@ symptoms, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ are the agents mentioned in most of the publications.

citations.NLM: Salado-Font SM, López-Muñoz F, Povedano-Montero FJ, Labella Quesada F. Bibliometric analysis of the scientific production as regards statin use for ophthalmological symptoms of myasthenia gravis. Arch Soc Esp Oftalmol. 2017 Oct;92(10):464-471. PMID: 28318833
